Compute row-wise averages for BILL_AMT and PAY_AMT columns

compute_avg_amounts.Rd

Adds two new columns: avg_bill_amt and avg_pay_amt to the data frame, and removes the original billing and payment columns.

Usage

compute_avg_amounts(df)

Arguments

df

A data frame containing columns like bill_amt1 to bill_amt6, and pay_amt1 to pay_amt6.

Value

A modified data frame with average columns and without the original billing/payment columns.
